title: Used to pray in my room with pictures of living things, are all my prayers invalid? assim al hakeem
transcript: uh so uh I had a question all the time I had these pictures in my uh room where I pray of uh living things for example I had a picture of myself which is uh prohibited and all the time I prayed in uh with these pictures in my room in the same room so all my worries that I've done invalid or no the prayer is valid but you're sinful for keeping such pictures hung on the walls the prayer is in the prayer is valid alhamdulillah but you're sinful these are two separate things and Allah Knows Best
